humanum_full_description_en:
From " Tao " to " Ge " on the inscription, " Tao " is the sound symbol. Xiao Zhuan omits " fu ", only from the sound of " ge " from " bao ". The ancient sounds of " tao " and " bao " are similar. The original meaning is a worker who makes leather. "Shuowen": "Yin, soft leather craftsmanship. From the leather bag sound. Read Ruopu. "Zhou Li" said: "The soft leather craftsman Bao's." Yin 卽 Baoye." "Wan Yin Pianhai": " 𩍂 Same as Yin.”

Bronze writing is used as a surname, and later written as " Bao ". Qi Houpin: "Qi Pi (bao) hangs (uncle)'s grandson". "𩍂 Hanging" means "Uncle Bao". "Yuanhe Surname Compilation": "Bao, the surname Si. After Xia Yu, there was Uncle Bao, Shi Qi, and the food was from Bao, Yin.
humanum_short_description_en: " Tao " on the inscriptions from " Ge ", " Tao " is the sound symbol. Xiao Zhuan omits " fu ", only from the sound of " ge " from " bao ". The ancient sounds of " tao " and " bao " are similar. The original meaning is a worker who makes leather.
humanum_full_description:
金文上從「陶」下從「革」，「陶」是聲符。小篆省去「阜」，只從「革」從「包」聲，「陶」、「包」古音相近。本義是製造皮革的工人。《說文》：「鞄，柔革工也。从革包聲。讀若朴。《周禮》曰：『柔皮之工鮑氏。』鞄卽鮑也。」《五音篇海》：「𩍂與鞄同。」

　　金文用作姓氏，後世寫作「鮑」。齊侯鎛：「齊辟𩍂(鮑)弔(叔)之孫」。「𩍂弔」即「鮑叔」。《元和姓纂》：「鮑，姒姓。夏禹之後有鮑叔，仕齊，食采於鮑，因氏。」
humanum_short_description: 金文上從「陶」下從「革」，「陶」是聲符。小篆省去「阜」，只從「革」從「包」聲，「陶」、「包」古音相近。本義是製造皮革的工人。

Chinese Definition:
①古指制皮革的工人。
②古同“匏”，八音之一。
③古同“枹”，鼓槌。
④姓氏。
Chinese Definition:
Freq: 9010
Kanshudo mnemonic:the leather (革) wrapped (勹) around a snake (巳) becomes a bag

金文上從「 陶 」下從「 革 」，「 陶 」是聲符。小篆省去「 阜 」，只從「 革 」從「 包 」聲，「 陶 」、「 包 」古音相近。本義是製造皮革的工人。《說文》：「鞄，柔革工也。从革包聲。讀若朴。《周禮》曰：『柔皮之工鮑氏。』鞄卽鮑也。」《五音篇海》：「𩍂與鞄同。」 金文用作姓氏，後世寫作「 鮑 」。齊侯鎛：「齊辟𩍂(鮑)弔(叔)之孫」。「𩍂弔」即「鮑叔」。《元和姓纂》：「鮑，姒姓。夏禹之後有鮑叔，仕齊，食采於鮑，因氏。」
From " Tao" to " Ge" on the inscription, " Tao" is the sound symbol. Xiao Zhuan omits " fu", only from the sound of " ge" from " bao". The ancient sounds of " tao" and " bao" are similar. The original meaning is a worker who makes leather. "Shuowen": "Yin, soft leather craftsmanship. From the leather bag sound. Read Ruopu. "Zhou Li" said: "The soft leather craftsman Bao's." Yin 卽 Baoye." "Wan Yin Pianhai": " 𩍂 Same as Yin.” Bronze writing is used as a surname, and later written as " Bao". Qi Houpin: "Qi Pi (bao) hangs (uncle)'s grandson". "𩍂 Hanging" means "Uncle Bao". "Yuanhe Surname Compilation": "Bao, the surname Si. After Xia Yu, there was Uncle Bao, Shi Qi, and the food was from Bao, Yin.

鞄字的基本解释

鞄
páo
古指制皮革的工人。
古同“匏”，八音之一。
古同“枹”，鼓槌。
姓。

鞄字的汉语字典释义

[①]［páo］
［《廣韻》薄交切，平肴，並。］
［《廣韻》防教切，去效，並。］
［《廣韻》薄巧切，上巧，並。］
［《廣韻》匹角切，入覺，滂。］
(1)古代制革工。
(2)通“枹”。鼓槌。
(3)皮包。

鞄字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞄； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1386第38
【廣韻】【集韻】?匹角切，音璞。【說文】柔革工也。讀若朴。【周禮·冬官考工記·攻皮之工函鮑韗韋裘註】鮑，或爲鞄。倉頡篇有鞄?。【釋文】鞄，匹學切。劉音僕。　又【唐韻】蒲角切【集韻】弼角切，?音雹。又【集韻】蒲沃切，音僕。又匹沃切，砲入聲。又【廣韻】薄交切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蒲交切，?音庖。又【廣韻】蒲巧切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】部巧切，?音鮑。又【廣韻】防敎切【集韻】皮敎切【韻會】【正韻】步敎切，?音鉋。義?同。?字原作北下宛。鞄?或鞄䆓。
